form.title: Contact us
form.intro: Do you have questions or want to discuss cooperation opportunities? Fill out the form and we will get in touch with you.

intro.heading: Scientific and Research Collaboration
intro.paragraph1: Our goal is to bridge science with practice. We support both individual researchers and institutions seeking to innovate in medicine, biotechnology, and life sciences. If you have a research project idea or need support with the experimental part – feel free to contact us.
intro.paragraph2: We collaborate with universities, startups, research centers, and pharmaceutical and biotechnology companies. Regardless of your idea's stage – from concept to results analysis – we can help with implementation and publication.

scope.heading: Collaboration opportunities:
items: Conducting laboratory experiments and clinical trials
Scientific consultations and research concept development
Support in preparing grant applications and publications
Research commissions for institutions or private companies

note: We do not require formal affiliation – what matters is the idea, goal, and willingness to collaborate.
